resources.string:
Rules how to full blank:
 -If you want take mortgage and the price is between 10000 and 100000 dollars. You have to pay first 30% from the price. Your salary has to be more than 2000 dollars. And final amount will be +15%.
 -If you want take mortgage and the price is between 1000000 and 1000000 dollars. You have to pay first 40% from the price. Your salary has to be more than 5000 dollars. And final amount will be +15%. And your confidence has to be true.
 -If you want take consumer credit and the price is between 300 and 1000 dollars. Your salary has to be more than 100 dollars. And final amount will be +11%.
 If you want take consumer credit and the price is between 1000 and 10000 dollars. You salary has to be more than 400 dollars. And final amount will be +9%.
 -If you want take consumer credit and the price is between 10000 and 100000 dollars. You salary has to be more than 1000 dollars. And final amount will be +10%. And your confidence has to be true.
